name: Headwaters Capital Partners
overview:
Early Stage Investment Partnership in Life Sciences, Medical Devices, and Clean Tech.

Nourish: A little word with a lot of meaning:

The mightiest rivers are fed, nourished and grown from their Headwaters â€” the origin at their source. Early ideas and companies often benefit from similar support.

By definition, to nourish is to provide “whatever is necessary to promote growth or formation.” At Headwaters Capital Partners, nourish is what we do.

We identify promising business ideas and provide “whatever is necessary” for their “growth and formation.” We offer capital, contacts, strategic advice, organizational insight, and operational roles as necessary. We nourish ideas from their earliest stages to their full fruition. In ventures as diverse as revolutionary medical devices to clean energy generation, we have grown innovative concepts into profitable businesses.

Nourish also means to sustain health and well being. At Headwaters, we fund enterprises that sustain the health and well being of the communities in which we live, the planet we all share, and the health of individuals within it.

Financial vitality and social responsibility are not mutually exclusive. In fact, Headwaters Capital Partners has achieved both. With the proper nourishment, your business can spring to life too.

milestones.description: Series A investment in HeartFlow.  John, Stevens, Managing partner, joins HeartFlow as CEO

Headwaters Capital Partners obtains licences from Stanford's OTL and forms RegenMed Systems.   Partner John Stevens, interim CEO.  Partner Michael McCullough joins as co-founder and interim President.
